to all have problem with the unknown and annoying fucking shape this is the solution pls read it carefully

1) Go to the start menu
2) search the msconfig
3) Go to the booting option or boot
4) Click the advance option
5) Check the box only the number of processors
(NOTE: DON'T CHANGE YOUR NO. OF PROCESSORS IT WILL BE GLITCH THINGY LIKE THAT
